logic.name: Disable for non Institution clients and offerings in non editable status

trigger.javascript:
/**
 * The given logic is added to the panel of the form to display the
 * form as read-only for ministry(AEST) user and also allow the hidden component values
 * to be calculated.
 * If a form.io is loaded with readOnly attribute set to true, then the restricts
 * hidden components to calculate it's value by design.
 * Offerings which are not in Approved,Pending or Declined status
 * must not be editable.
*/
result = data.mode === "readonly";

logic.name: Enable offering inputs if no application is linked

trigger.javascript:
/**
 * If there are no applications linked
 * then enable all the inputs that affect the application assessment.
 * 
 * This action is done only for institution users
 * and offering in status Approved or Pending or Declined.
*/
result = data.mode === "assessment-data-readonly";

components.content: Study breaks

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Identify schedule breaks for the study period offering:
  • Study breaks of five or fewer consecutive calendar days that would normally be instructional days do not count towards study breaks.
  • Study breaks cannot exceed three weeks, or 21 consecutive days. Excess break days will be deducted from overall funded weeks.
  • Breaks in study may not exceed 10% (individually or cumulatively) of the study period offering length. Excess break days will be deducted from overall funded weeks.
